snippet: Phil Hughes, who missed 84 games and roughly 17 starts with shoulder inflammation in 2011, will start for the Yankees on Sunday against the Rays.
lead_paragraph: Phil Hughes, who missed 84 games and roughly 17 starts with shoulder inflammation in 2011, will start for the Yankees on Sunday against the Rays.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Hughes Eager to Get Started on New Season
headline.main: After Trying Stretch, Hughes Is Eager to Get Started on Fresh Season
headline.print_headline: After Trying Stretch, Hughes Is Eager to Get Started on Fresh Season
